title: please help me my name has ben changed :( please help me
body: help change my name unu my ex girldfriend hacked me :/

replies.body: Sorry to hear about this, breakups can suck especially if some vengeance gets involved.  :(  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help with getting your account back on its feet.  Hang tight!

She didn't "hack you".. You forgot to change your password after letting her use it while you were together... Rule one of breakups, change your passwords.

Instead of making a forum post, you should open a support ticket to customer services... Chances are they will tell you it's your own fault for lack of account security and you have to pay RP to change it again.

Actually you shouldn't be giving personal passwords to significant others to begin with, particularly if there's no ring involved.  It's just too easy to end a relationship these days and I don't think people understand long term planning and commitment.  The only things they should know is for "both of you" stuff.
